moves.name: Hex
moves.effect: This move’s power is doubled when the target is affected by a status condition.

moves.name: Run Along Now!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 6 stat ranks. The user takes damage equal to 25% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

syncMove.name: Tried-and-True Hex
syncMove.description: Become Mega Gengar until the end of battle. This move’s power increases when the target is asleep.

passives.name: Wide Awake
passives.description: Prevents the user from falling asleep.
